- Wall finish: textured drywall (orange peel/knockdown) around window. Location: interior wall adjacent to window.  
- Window frame: white, likely vinyl or painted finish; standard rectangular opening. Location: interior side of window.  
- Window coverings: white horizontal blinds; cords visible. Location: window.  
- Sill condition: white painted sill appears undamaged; no staining visible. Location: bottom edge of window.  
- No visible issues.
